title: Edinburgh,
author: Masson, Rosaline Orme.
snippet: Sir Walter Scott was one of the first directors of the Edinburgh Academy; and at the Opening, in 1825, he made a speech, and told " his young friends round him " that there was to be a class at this school not to be found

title: My college days,
author: Tomes, Robert
snippet: He had been a great friend of Sir Walter Scott, and had charge of his son Charles when a parish clergyman in Wales. When I knew him, he was the head-master of the Edinburgh Academy, which the Tories and aristocrats had established as a rival to the democratic High School.

title: Noctes ambrosianæ,
author: Wilson, John
snippet: 1 The new Edinburgh Academy was established in 1S25. The High School dates from 1519.
